articles.description: The Big 12 Conference meat-grinder has taken its toll on Iowa State this season, and it's starting to chew its way through the early frontrunners, one of which was Kansas.
articles.headline: Big 12 tests continue for No. 13 Kansas, Iowa State

articles.description: All season long, No. 7 Texas Tech and No. 23 Oklahoma have been shining examples of two different ways to win games and gain national attention.
articles.headline: No. 7 Texas Tech aims to keep momentum vs. No. 23 Oklahoma

articles.description: Joel Berry II drives in the lane and sinks a floater while drawing a foul to set up a 3-point play for North Carolina.
articles.headline: Berry falls and scores while drawing foul

images.caption: Joel Berry II drives in the lane and sinks a floater while drawing a foul to set up a 3-point play for North Carolina.
images.name: Joel Berry II drives in the lane and sinks a floater while drawing a foul to set up a 3-point play for North Carolina.

articles.description: Michigan State probably needs to win its remaining four games. It needs some help to capture the Big Ten regular-season title after an exhilarating home victory over Purdue on Saturday kept them in the race.
articles.headline: No. 2 Michigan State begins critical road stetch vs. Minnesota

articles.description: Jared Sam scored 18 points and grabbed 15 rebounds to help Southern beat Mississippi Valley State 55-51 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Sam's double-double leads Southern past MVSU 55-51

articles.description: Head coach Mike Brey says he likes Notre Dame's tempo and the way they are playing at the half down 4 to North Carolina.
articles.headline: Brey: 'We're right where we want to be'

images.caption: Head coach Mike Brey says he likes Notre Dame's tempo and the way they are playing at the half down 4 to North Carolina.
images.name: Brey: 'We're right where we want to be'

videos.description: Tyus Battle's third 3-pointer of the second half gives the Orange its largest lead.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Battle buries 3-pointer

videos.description: Tyrus Battle drains a deep 3-pointer to extend the lead for Syracuse.
videos.headline: Battle from swishes from downtown

videos.description: Tim Bond's tomahawk dunk brings fans out of their seats.
videos.headline: EMU's Bond slams it down with authority
